downloadDescription: Connected Cloud Promotion for Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online
detailsSection:
The easy to adopt, easy to use business solutions from Microsoft helps government organizations be more productive.  Connect with customers – both current and prospective - in ways never done before.  Microsoft Dynamics CRM combined with Office 365 can help transform an organization, allowing teams to gain deep knowledge of their customers. We can help organizations zero in and focus on the information that helps them optimize their businesses.
Offer terms:
39.5% off Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online Professional full USL license;
Discount only applies to plans within the Government Community Cloud (GCC) 
Corresponding Office 365 Government Community Cloud plans must be acquired at the time or prior to requesting this promotion
Each promotional license must be assigned to a user to whom an Office 365 Plan GCC G3 or G4 license has been assigned 
Promotion can be cancelled or changed at any time.
No discount on subscription add-ons 
This promotion is available through Volume Licensing Enterprise Agreements only
This promotion cannot be combined with any other Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online Professional discount
This offer cannot be converted into cash.
This offer is non-transferable.
Taxes, if any, are the sole responsibility of the recipient.
